DEMO_022_MSG_010:
̂This is the Virtual Colosseum. An institute created 
for the sole purpose of exclusively training Monster Masters.
DEMO_022_MSG_020: ̂I must apologize, as I have no physical form to greet you with.
DEMO_022_MSG_100:
̂This ability will allow you to mount a monster and ride it 
across the land portions of the vast areas you will encounter.
ā
DEMO_022_MSG_030:
̂I am part of an Artifical Intelligence system, tasked with 
maintaining this facility.
ā
DEMO_022_MSG_110: ̂Expanding your horizons and taking advantage of this opportunity is a key step on your journey ahead.
DEMO_022_MSG_040:
̂You can call me Theresa. I will be your instructor, and I'm here to issue your Monster Master License Exam.
ā
DEMO_022_MSG_120:
̂At this time, Master ȁ, we will begin the 
C-Rank Monster Master License Exam.
ā
DEMO_022_MSG_050: ̂Allow me one moment to confirm that you are an authorized user of this training facility.
DEMO_022_MSG_060:
̂My scan indicates that ȁ is indeed confirmed... Now registering this Master's information...
ā
DEMO_022_MSG_070:
̂You have been identified as Master #%ls...
Welcome to training, Master ȁ.
ā
DEMO_022_MSG_080:
̂It is at this time that I would like to proceed by issuing
your Monster Master Licensing Exam.
ā
DEMO_022_MSG_090:
̂Upon completion of this specific License Exam, you
will be granted the ability to "Land Ride" your monsters.
